document: DEVELOPING BODY IMAGE AND SKILLS OF ORIENTATION, MOBILITY AND SOCIAL COMPETENCE IN PRESCHOOL MULTIPLY HANDICAPPED BLIND CHILDREN by MARY EVA WELFER MOORE B.S., UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH, 1962 M.ED., UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH, 1965 Submitted to the Graduate Faculty in the School of Education in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy University of Pittsburgh 1970
